events.title: Fall Fashion Show
events.description: Join us for an exclusive preview of our fall collection featuring warm layers, cozy textures, and rich autumn colors. Light refreshments will be served.

events.title: Holiday Shopping Event
events.description: Start your holiday shopping early with special discounts, complimentary gift wrapping, and personalized styling consultations for gift recipients.

events.title: Winter Styling Workshop
events.description: Learn how to layer stylishly for winter weather and create versatile looks that transition from day to night. Includes hands-on styling tips and tricks.

events.title: New Year, New Style Event
events.description: Start the new year with a fresh perspective on your personal style. Enjoy 20% off select items and complimentary wardrobe consultations.

events.title: Valentine's Day Trunk Show
events.description: Discover romantic pieces perfect for date nights and special occasions. Featured designer will be present for meet and greet.

events.title: Spring Preview Party
events.description: Be the first to see our spring collection featuring fresh colors, flowing fabrics, and versatile pieces perfect for the changing season.
